DOC.brief_summary: Pulse pressure variation ( PPV ) well-known dynamic preload indicator predict fluid responsiveness . However , usefulness open-chest condition equivocal . The investigator evaluate whether PPV measure Valsalva maneuver predict fluid responsiveness sternotomy .
DOC.brief_title: Pulse Pressure Variation Measured During Valsalva Maneuver Predict Fluid Responsiveness Under Open-chest Condition
DOC.criteria: Adult patient undergo elective offpump coronary arterial bypass graft Preoperative LV EF < = 35 % Moderate severe valvular heart disease Cardiac arrhythmia Intracardiac shunt Severe renal liver disease Moderate severe pulmonary hypertension ( mean PAP > 35 mmHg ) Patients bullous lung disease combine pneumothorax
